entries.meaning: (dated, offensive) One who takes an interest in the black (negro) race.
examples: In the form of a dedication to those colonists who have been ruined by the revolution of the ‘negrophiles,’ our author contrives to give a life and character of himself; reminds these unfortunate people  […]  how he used to plead their causes for small fees; how he afterwards gave up the bar in order to fight for them  […]
